directions: Preheat oven to 375 F. Combine all ingredients in a large mixing bowl; stir well. Form into 1inch balls. Place on ungreased baking sheet; bake 18-20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven; cool 5 minutes before removing from pan. Serve with cocktail forks or toothpicks.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) packages Regular Flavor Jimmy Dean Pork Sausage
title: Jimmy Dean Sausage Cheese Balls
